spirit:component.spirit:name: axi_dma_0
spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx AXI DMA LogiCORE provides a flexible interface for transferring packet data between system memory (AXI4) and AXI4-Stream target IP. Optional Scatter / Gather Engine provides offloading of processor management of DMA transfers. Optional Scatter / Gather Descriptor Queuing allows prefetching of transfer descriptors providing uninterrupted transfer requests to be processed by the primary DMA controllers. Independent operation between MM2S (transmit channel) and S2MM (receive channel) allows for full duplex operation of the AXI DMA engine. Multi-Descriptor per packet functionality is also provided allowing for packet data to be read or written across distributed buffer locations in system memory. Optional AXI4 Control Stream and AXI4 Status Stream provide side band transfer capabilities for transferring user meta data associated with the primary packet transfer. Typical applications for the Control and Status streams are for functions like Checksum offloading on AXI Ethernet. Optional Data Re-Alignment Engines allow for transfers to and from any byte offset in system memory. Simple DMA mode is also provide for a low resource utilization option for commanding simple DMA transfers.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_include_sg
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Enabling Scatter Gather improves the performance of the DMA to a large extent. With this, the DMA fetches and queues more descriptors thereby improving the performance.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_enable_multi_channel
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This feature enables the 2D read and write support. Refer the product guide for more information.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_num_mm2s_channels
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the number of MM2S channels to be used in Multi Channel Mode.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_num_s2mm_channels
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Specify the number of S2MM channels to be used in Multi Channel Mode.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_sg_length_width
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This is the number of valid bits in the buffer-length field of the Buffer Descriptor or the BTT register.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_prmry_is_aclk_async
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: If any one of the clocks is asynchronous then select this. Please refer Product Guide for additional information related to allowed combinations of clock frequencies.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_sg_include_stscntrl_strm
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This enables the Control/Status Stream of on the DMA. This is used in Ethernet based systems to convey Control and Status information to and from Ethernet.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_include_mm2s
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Enable the trasmit path i.e. Memory to Stream.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_m_axi_mm2s_data_width
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the data bus on Memory Map Side.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_m_axis_mm2s_tdata_width
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the data bus on Streaming Side. This can never be more than the Memory Mapped Data Width

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_include_mm2s_dre
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select this only when the addressing on Memory Mapped Side could be unaligned. Enabling this feature increases the resource count.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_mm2s_burst_size
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: This sets the Max Burst Length for the AXI4 Memory Mapped transaction.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_include_s2mm
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Enables the receive path i.e. from Stream to Memory.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_sg_use_stsapp_length
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: When enabled, the DMA will use the app length value on the S2MM Status Frame to calculate the bytes received. This is optionally used when DMA is connected to Ethernet.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_m_axi_s2mm_data_width
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the data bus on Memory Mapped Side.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_s_axis_s2mm_tdata_width
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Width of the data bus on Streaming Side. This can never be more than the Memory Mapped Data Width.

spirit:parameter.spirit:name: c_include_s2mm_dre
spirit:parameter.spirit:description: Select this only when the addressing on Memory Mapped Side could be unaligned. Enabling this feature increases the resource count.
